definitions.text: a protective covering that covers or forms the top of a building
protective covering on top of a motor vehicle
the inner top surface of a covered area or hollow space
examples: the roof of the cave was very high
I could see the roof of the bear's mouth

definitions.text: an upper limit on what is allowed
examples: he put a ceiling on the number of women who worked for him
there was a roof on salaries
they established a cap for prices

definitions.text: provide a building with a roof; cover a building with a roof
